Text: There's a lot broken files in it! Chapter 18 for example: films 2, 3, 7, 8, 10 and 12. The same as torrent by jthxxxgfh.

Ditto what Pompeius said...many of the videos (33 actually) appear only as 2 byte files, and will obviously not play. Just take a look at the file list in your Torrent client and you'll see for yourself.  Still, lots of good info, so thanks for the up, just feel obliged to warn all about the shortcomings in this torrent.

To All Of My Awesome Supporters
---------------------------------------
At the end of this week I am stepping down from the gordsmash title and giving it to my pal. I want to thank everyone for supporting gordsmash and uploading my torrents to keep them alive! I hoped that everyone of you has enjoyed my torrents! I want to thank all of you for supporting me! Thank you all and goodbye!
